div.class: d-inline-flex align-items-center mb-4 px-3 py-2 rounded-pill text-primary

div.h1: The Digital Wallet That Delivers Hope
div.p: The Redeem App by Taqat, in partnership with Qatar Charity, transforms aid distribution. More than a wallet, it's a direct line to hope, forging a seamless connection between administrators, individuals, and merchants for total transparency and efficiency.

div.h4: A Seamless Ecosystem for Digital Funds Delivery
div.p: Manage, distribute, and track funds with our integrated platform designed for organizations, beneficiaries, and merchants.

img.class: position-absolute w-100 top-0 end-0 start-0 z-index-0

div.class: position-relative background_mobile rounded-circle text-center m-auto pt-5

div.p: Simple apps for beneficiaries to pay and merchants to receive.
Track funds in real-time, get reports, and ensure total accountability.
Automate transfers and merchant payments to reduce your administrative burdens.
Manage your organization aids from one central, secure web dashboard.
Funds are only spent within our secure, verified partner network.
Funds are only spent at authorized merchants, completely eliminating fraud.

svg.class: position-absolute d-lg-block d-none start-0 top-0 z-n1

div.p: Your organization signs up on the Taqat platform. Our team verifies your documents to establish a secure and trusted partnership.
Easily upload a list of your beneficiaries and define the balance to be allocated to each person through your dedicated portal.
Log in to your portal at any time to see a complete overview of all transactions. Monitor your program's impact with powerful, real-time data and detailed spending reports.
Our system automatically manages fund distribution and ensures secure transactions while providing complete transparency and control over your charity programs.
We provide round-the-clock support through multiple channels and ensure your data is protected by advanced encryption and security protocols.
The Redeem app provides more than just technology, it delivers tangible benefits for your organization and the communities you serve.

button.class: accordion-header fw-bolder align-items-start ps-0 accordion-button fw-bold fs-4 gap-2 bg-transparent h6-fs fw-bold text-decoration-none text-reset transition-none justify-content-end flex-row-reverse o_icons_position_reversed

div.p: Move beyond handing out goods and give beneficiaries the freedom to choose what they truly need.

button.class: accordion-header fw-bolder align-items-start ps-0 fw-bold fs-4 accordion-button gap-2 bg-transparent h6-fs fw-bold text-decoration-none text-reset transition-none justify-content-end flex-row-reverse o_icons_position_reversed

div.p: By partnering with local merchants, you ensure that aid money directly supports and strengthens the communities you serve.

button.class: accordion-header fw-bolder align-items-start ps-0 fw-bold fs-4 accordion-button gap-2 bg-transparent h6-fs fw-bold text-decoration-none text-reset transition-none justify-content-end flex-row-reverse o_icons_position_reversed

div.p: Eliminate the logistical challenges and costs associated with procuring, storing, and distributing physical goods or cash.

button.class: accordion-header fw-bolder align-items-start ps-0 fw-bold fs-4 accordion-button gap-2 bg-transparent h6-fs fw-bold text-decoration-none text-reset transition-none justify-content-end flex-row-reverse o_icons_position_reversed

div.p: Whether you support ten beneficiaries or ten thousand, our platform is built to scale with the size and complexity of your mission.

div.class: col-lg-6 hero_section pb-5 pb-lg-0 order-1 order-lg-2

div.h4: Ready to Transform Your Aid Distribution?
div.p: Join the growing number of organizations using Redeem App to deliver aid with more efficiency, transparency, and impact than ever before. Let's build a better future together.

div.class: links row align-items-center m-auto gap-4 align-items-center

a.class: btn rounded-4 w-100 col-lg w-lg-auto text-start h-100 align-items-center btn-primary d-flex gap-3 rounded-3
btn col-lg w-100 w-lg-auto h-100 align-items-center btn-outline-primary d-flex gap-3 rounded-4

div.class: links flex-wrap row align-items-center m-auto gap-4 align-items-center

a.class: btn rounded-4 col-lg w-100 h-auto w-lg-auto text-start h-100 align-items-center btn-secondary d-flex gap-3 rounded-3
btn col-lg w-100 h-auto w-lg-auto h-100 align-items-center btn-outline-secondary d-flex gap-3 rounded-4
